website_summaries.verdict: This stainless steel rack is designed to hang from cabinets and is built to hold up to 22 pounds.
pros: Comes with a strongly built rack that includes 10 hooks with 2 inches of space in between each hook
This space helps to handle bigger mugs
It can fit 10 small cups or 6 large cups easily
The rack is made with high quality steel
cons: This item doesn’t come with screws, so if you want a more secure install, you’ll have to get that on your own

customer_reviews.title: Great mug holders!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, easy hanging on the board, the only thing is for a medium size of cup it can only holds up to 4 cups; I t’s a little disappointing to me, because I thought it could hold more. But it did help me save space in my cabinet—still satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit standard size cups
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold normal coffee drinker sized cups. Hardly even fits my kiddo’s Garfield milk cups. Even tried my tiniest coffee cups and those dont fit either.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Hooks, not a mug holder.
customer_reviews.text: Probably better used for holding kitchen spoons or hand towels. Hooks are too close together to fit mugs.
customer_reviews.author: ZB

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit shelves
customer_reviews.text: Should specify the rack will only fit a shelf that is 1 inch thick or less. Will not fit on my cabinet shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary D. Noel

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: These really helped fill the dead apace of my tiny kitchen. I had extra space but no extra shelves these solved the problem. Got my mugs and soup bowls hanging from them. Works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Hold Much Weight
customer_reviews.text: The is shown holding several coffee mugs, it fit wonderfully on my cabinet shelf and slide right on... however after putting more than 3 coffee mugs on the hooks the product started to bend at the elbow and the shelf started to sag and get lower. They weren't even that big of coffee mugs... However.. I hate throwing things away so I put it on my cabinet in my bathroom and hung necklaces on it and it worked good for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love that its very strong and a very tight fit. You would have to open it wide to apply it to the cabinet if you do not want it to scratch. Only down side it that you cannot fit alot of mugs on it. Its fine with me due to me living alone and not needing much. (its more for showing) But if your looking to fill every last hook this isn't the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This mug holder works very well. It is fairly easy to install. The thicker the shelf, the more difficult it would be as it clamps very tight. I would give it five stars, however, I’m afraid that on some shelves the metal bars will damage the material or the paint. It might be nice if there were rubber or something along where the bars clamp the shelf. Additionally, the larger the mugs you are hanging, the fewer you can fit. Overall, this is a great mug hanger for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: These really help give me the space I needed, since I have a older house my cabinets are smaller and this help me make good use of my space! Easy solution for those needing space
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn Rice Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Reviews on other products complained that some bent if anything very heavy was hung on them. These will definitely not have that problem. I bought some that will only hold measuring spoons and cups, so weight isn't a factor, but I want to install one near the coffee maker for mugs. I anticipate no problems due to the sturdiness of the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Useful for small cups
customer_reviews.text: Very excited when I ordered. Little disappointed that even regular size cups won't nicely fit. If I leave one row of slots vacant on each column, I can put them. My husband grumbles that it makes him nervous to take cups from the back. Nevertheless, I bought second one to fit all my cups as it looks super nice to hang cups this way with lot of storage space freed. Steel looks sturdy enough to last few years.
customer_reviews.author: Surya

customer_reviews.title: Round holders on top, couldnt use shelf above it
customer_reviews.text: why would anyone make the holders round instead of flat- your cant put anything on the shelf on top where these are located- so silly. Only buy these if you are NOT using the shef above it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great mug under counter rack. I purchased 6 very largebaize mugs which I did not want in my cabinet with the other mugs. This was the ideal solution. I opted for the larger rack which holds more mugs and glad indid because the mugs were so large I needed to skip a hook to accommodate the bulkiness of the mugs I was able to fit the mugs. It is study, made of quality construction and I am confident the mugs will not fall off and break. This is an ideal solution for limited space in cabinets and it looks rather chic. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Brittnei Mullin

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I have standard/average cabinets and, like, most cabinets, they have a wood finish that comes up above the level of the shelves, keeping my cups and plates from falling out. This cup rack is too stiff and does not stretch enough to get over the wood finish. I was unable to use it and had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for handbags as well as mugs!
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved and I was adamant that our new home would be organized and neat. I ordered this mug holder after seeing that it could be used in a closet to organize handbags. I also have used them to organize baseball caps, and other odds and ends in closets. Easy to slide onto the closet shelf and it holds a decent amount of weight.
customer_reviews.author: angela rossi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, useful space saver, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: First, make sure you know where you will put this product when you buy it. There are not may naturally-occurring installation spots in most kitchens I've seen. Second, know that heavier mugs on the free-hanging side will pull down from the weight of mugs, etc. (I put a small bolt in with a washer to help hold that end up. Finally, if you have larger mugs, they may not fit well on adjacent hooks (all our mugs, due to shape, fit best hanging every other hook). That said, it was a good solution to our overcrowded cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Good for small cups
customer_reviews.text: Easy going up.. but doesn’t fit as many cups as advertised.. maybe if you have small coffee cups but regular sized ones I only got 4 (2 on each side) and they had to go into each other same direction.. still cleared up some space for me. So I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karolina B.

customer_reviews.title: Not for older cabinets
customer_reviews.text: I need cup storage and thought this might work for me. Well it didn't as my cupboard shelves were just a little thicker than the specs called for. So they didn't work for me. They would probably work just fine in some of the newer cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Kayt

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but not enough space between hooks
customer_reviews.text: It is super easy to install and it is a quality product. However, The distance between hooks does not leave enough room for 10 normal sized mugs to line up. Some mugs are off to the side and fall off very easily. It would definitely work better if the hooks were facing forward so the mugs could hang side-by-side. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I could only put 4 cups on this... although it has 6 hooks. VERY hard to install for someone with weakness in hands. I got it on and it will work. The shelf I put it on was NOT as thick as this should fit, but as I said... very difficult to install. I do not believe I would of been able to install if the shelf had been thicker. Mine was only 1 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Practical and organized
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, arrived on time and well packed. No assembly required just slide the coffee mug holder through edge of shelf and it is ready to use. If you have big mugs you may need more then one coffee cup holder to store more than 6 mugs, it depends how deep your mugs/cups are.
customer_reviews.author: C. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Cool Product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those cool products that you by and then find a million uses for it. I have used it to hang many things not just cups (necklaces, paintbrushes, potholders, etc. Hanging things under a shelf is great when space is limited.
customer_reviews.author: WorkingTowardsBetter

customer_reviews.title: Durable Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice and durable the only problem is the hooks are to close, you can only hang small cups on them, I turned every other hook the other direction so all hooks can be utilized.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Postle

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described. It holds several coffee mugs (number depends on their size) thus freeing up shelf space. We were sufficiently pleased that we purchased a second one and are using both.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work like it says.
customer_reviews.text: First off. It can not hold four mugs. It can hold 3 BUT when you try to close the cabinet door they hit each other and fall off the hook. Completely useless and one of the mugs that fell off now have a chip so have to throw that away. I would return but I threw the packaging away and due to covid I don’t want to go to the post office. Very sad :(
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin3

customer_reviews.title: Organization of Items
customer_reviews.text: Coffee mug holder fit ver well and I was able to organize all my mugs. Before ordering you must decide what mug sizes you are planning to use as this will determine how many you can fit.
customer_reviews.author: Organzier Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Only down side is the top of this hook/hanger thing is fairly large so if you are storing something above where this is going it may not work out possibly look at the hangers similar to these but with a thinner profile and not so bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Daddys Profile

customer_reviews.title: Maximize your shelf space!
customer_reviews.text: I have several sets of tea and coffee cups and awkward little soup bowls with handles that were taking up a ton of shelf space. These cup holders slide right over the shelf and accommodated every single one of my cups/bowls with plenty of room to spare! They are so well stored I might even use them now (before I was afraid to touch them because they were stacked and could have easily fallen over). Don't know why I didn't use them sooner....
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Kamm

customer_reviews.title: Love this mug holder! No tools 😃
customer_reviews.text: Great rack to utilize cabinet storage! There’s no installation since you just place them under an existing shelf , they slide over it. Sturdy and functional! Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: SHARON KIDD

customer_reviews.title: Better for small mugs
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem, as others have noticed, is that you cannot fit standard-sized mugs on each hook. But it was easy to install and use, and currently I'm using every other hook.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Rehak

customer_reviews.title: Ready to use
customer_reviews.text: Really no installation just slide it on a shelf. Like that it makes more room in the cabinet. NOT for use in fifth wheels or RVs . it doesn't open up enough to fit. Rvs have that ridge to hold everything in while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Dashford

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Sent this back, it didn’t work for me, this is for small tea cups, didn’t work for large coffee cups. Was sturdy and easy to install, would be fine for small cups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for my shelves unfortunately I was on vacation during the window of time and I’m stuck with it. It needs to be used on thin shelves and unfortunately my shelves are wide
customer_reviews.author: Christina M

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!  Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 foot wood shelf in my kitchen above my stove and counter area. Was looking for cup racks and ordered one. It can only hold 4 of my large coffee mugs but I quickly saw the versatility and ordered 7 more. I not only use them for my mugs, but use for cooking utensils and pots/pans. I have limited storage space and this puts everything where I need it, when need it. Very durable and easy to install. Could not be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These only work for teeny, tiny cups!
customer_reviews.text: My cups are very short, yet they bump into each other because the hanging hooks are way too close to each other. DO NOT use if you have normal or tall cups.
customer_reviews.author: h2odancer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed that the rack really didn't hold 10 mugs. or even 6. I was only able to place 4 mugs on to the rack which in turn wasn't as helpful I was hoping for storage purposes. The sturdiness of the rack was great. But the whole purpose was to have more storage space for my mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy mugs.
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to install and functional. However it won’t hold the weight of my mugs with one on each prong. It will only hold 6 of my mugs due to weight and spacing between prongs. It would work best for small light weight mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Hooks spaced too closely...
customer_reviews.text: The hooks were too close together to hold our mugs. Perhaps small teacups would fit, but not your average mug.
customer_reviews.author: Jehu

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage option for mugs.
customer_reviews.text: These would serve smaller sized mugs best. I have some larger mugs which make it hard for them to all be held on there.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Cline

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these when I purchased a larger set of dishes to help organize my cupboards. They were exactly as described and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa daidone

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I use for coffee cups so only every other hook is used but it's very helpful for my space. Lighter tea cups would likely let more hooks be used.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Swan

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is great, but the hooks are so close together that we can only put a mug on every other one. So 6 mugs total instead of 10. Which is fine, if you had small mugs I’m sure it would work out better
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I bought two.
customer_reviews.text: I used the cup holders to display my pretty tea cups on a corner shelf. I was about to use both in a small space. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy coffee mug holder
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy it was to install! It snaps right on and it’s sturdy as heck. Only downside is that it really is for cappuccino cups like how it’s pictured, and not standard coffee mugs. At least not 8 standard cups. I can fit 4 on the hooks at most. Which doesn’t really both me but was a surprise. I would still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat helpful
customer_reviews.text: Well made product and easy to install but hooks are too close together, I can only get 6 regular sized mugs on it
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for hanging coffee cups in a tight space, the other I am using to hang my scarves-works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: Can only really hold 4-6 mugs at a time, depending on the size of the mugs. Nothing to go crazy over.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Great organizing for cups made to last
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! It really helped me organize the many coffee cups we have and saved lots of room at the same time. Product is made well so it looks like it will hold well for hopefully many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Best cup organizer on the planet!
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought 8 huge cups from Anthropologie. They do not stack well and take up a lot of space. I sear he amazon for hanging options and this was the only one with hooks turned 90 degrees. How smart! The hanging cups fit perfectly and are a pleasure to use. This is OCD certified product and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Yavorskiy

customer_reviews.title: Yes for shelf, no for cabinet bottoms
customer_reviews.text: Nothing negative, just will not work with bottom level of kitchen cabinets, only internal shelves. Bottoms of cabinets too tall
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice holder
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Easy to hang up on any boards in a cabinet. Would like to have several for all my mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Liqiang

customer_reviews.title: good cup holder
customer_reviews.text: This cup holder rack works fine for medium weight cups. I did not try it with heavy cups.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, super easy to install, but hooks are very close together
customer_reviews.text: Could not have been easier to install - this snapped right on to the ledge of our buffet. It feels very sturdy. My only complaint is the hooks are very close together. Our teacups are small but they do touch each other so I just ended up using every over hook.
customer_reviews.author: Hoya Girl

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my vintage tea cups, easy to install & sturdy
customer_reviews.author: princess buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s good. Not gonna hold that many coffee mugs - no room. But probably holds that many espresso mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Alboreo

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for really large mugs.
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept. Love the product. However, if you have the large mugs that are on trend, it doesn’t hold but 4 of them. I don’t believe that’s the products fault but just something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ashcraft

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing small cupboards
customer_reviews.text: Great for organizing small cupboards - my mug/glass cabinet was a mess and items would often fall out when I opened the door. So I bought this to help me tidy up. It is very sturdy and does the job; however, if your mugs are larger, you won’t be able to hang as many as is pictured, which is why I gave it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: l b fox

customer_reviews.title: Not for large cups or mugs.
customer_reviews.text: Works poorly on anything larger than very small or flat cups. SEE PHOTO!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Crumpton

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!!
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly in my kitchen cabinet. But not all 8 coffee mugs fit in the holder due to my cabinets being very short but I was able to fit 4 mugs on it. I’m perfectly okay with that due to my small space but I will definitely be ordering another one for the empty space I have next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Would hold small mugs just fine. M-lrg can’t fit as many. Usually fits 5 of tose instead of 10. Very sturdy can not be pulled off easy.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived and worked as expected. I think it ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and worked as expected. I think it is designed for smaller coffee mugs. My coffee mugs were a little large for this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Price was great! Love this so much. Easy to install and move when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, very sturdy and looks good in my new cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best ever. Perfect for my cabinets. Frees up space Will b ordering more !! Jus bought second one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay holder
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay but cannot holds bigger coffee mugs or heavier. It is for smaller cups that do no weigh much. Nothing to assemble and does right on your cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Franz Nuernberger

customer_reviews.title: Do not like.
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this. It does not hold very well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Amos

customer_reviews.title: Just a little short
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is very useful, but I wish it had been a little longer and suitable for small mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Royal

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit my cabinet shelf.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t fit the cabinet I wanted to use it for, it was too small. So I used it in my pantry instead. I measured the dimensions before ordering, but I made it work as best as I could. Hopefully it’ll fit in the next place we end up moving to.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Buy smaller rack for better fit
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying two of the smaller ones because my cabinet depth wasn’t big enough for the larger rack. They fit nice and snug and the door closes with no problems. It will hold 4 large mugs or 8 smaller ones. I’m going to buy another one! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A.

customer_reviews.title: Hooks Too Close
customer_reviews.text: It's a great idea but if your cups are taller than an inch you can't hang more than 4 coffee mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Cypress Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Check the size of your  cabinets before your purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was nice but it didn’t fit my cabinet space it was too long my cabinets are shorter so it sticks out a little bit
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nelson’s

customer_reviews.title: Not for solid thick cuboard
customer_reviews.text: Won't fit any cuboard that has any thickness to it
customer_reviews.author: lorie keppler

customer_reviews.text: Did not fit under my cabinet like in the picture only inside
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the product. It’s functional. I can use all 8 hooks for my standard tea cups and close the cabinets. Satisfied 🙂
customer_reviews.author: vtyagi123

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to maximize my space. This hook can easily hold 6-7 cups depending on the cup size. My cousin came to visit me and saw this product, she really like the simplicity and how sturdy it was. Highly recommend to family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Janny

customer_reviews.title: Added the extra space I need.
customer_reviews.text: It worked out really good for me for space. However, my mugs are larger than the ones shown, so I can only fit six. Still added more space. I may order another and have them side by side.
customer_reviews.author: SueGoll

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy way to save some space and show some decor mugs or hang whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Victimizer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: This isnt wide enough to fit all the way on my shelf, it still works, I just cant close my cabinet all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Brantley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great space saver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and created much more room in our cupboards. Only thing is that it’s made for mugs on the smaller side. We are able to fit about about 4 larger mugs on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Terrible idea
customer_reviews.text: This idea of organizing the cups is the worse. You would have to have tiny cups to fit that holder.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Install? You just slide it in and done. No screws no damage no mess. Very sturdy and I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice design in theory
customer_reviews.text: Notice how in the picture the hook in the middle isn't being used? Yea... that's because they're too close together to use for normal size mugs... I'm returning this
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Ok purchase
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is that it only holds 4 normal size mugs because the hooks are so close together. This would be ideal for mugs that are SMALL.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Great for hanging Necklaces
customer_reviews.text: I’d like them to hang my costume jewelry on this way I can see the necklaces and no longer have to keep them in boxes. They would not have worked for my Cups as the hangers were too close together. They are great for my necklaces
customer_reviews.author: Joan Mellusi

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very misleading. You can only fit four standard mugs.
customer_reviews.author: LMM23

customer_reviews.title: Great way to free up cabinet space
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pop right on the the bottom cabinet. Holds four medium coffee cups and frees up some cabinet space, which is always a plus!
customer_reviews.author: melissa rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Can't fit 8 mugs but 6 is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like the set up, easy to install under the upper cupboard, nice place for the coffee mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds china tea cups nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for the job given. Not sure I would trust heavier mugs on it and it is sized such that it would be difficult for larger mugs/cups to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. McCord

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy but pretty small for average sized mugs
customer_reviews.text: It was very sturdy and exactly as ordered but the wording on what is considered a "large" and "small" mug is a little confusing so basically, if you have a normal coffee mug, consider it a large mug for this.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: for espresso cups only
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold coffee mugs or American size coffee cups. Holds espresso coffee cups.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Cotzias

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy !!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is very well made, very sturdy and stable. Does not move and slide when taking a mug off.
customer_reviews.author: CLMY

customer_reviews.title: It’s great, you won’t regret.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very space saving , highly efficient to take and put washed cups back to hanger. Once you open the cabinet door it’s looking good also. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kashyap Desai

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like it says
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, just wish I would have read the product description better. I am only able to get 4 standard size mugs on here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves lots of space
customer_reviews.text: Working good so far, saves room in our cabinet and holds mugs. Larger mugs make it so you can’t use each hook, but with small mugs you probably could.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Newman

customer_reviews.title: You need very small mugs
customer_reviews.text: My mugs are not all the same size nor are they tiny. I can only put a total of four mugs on at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Kim fisher

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't fit all cabinets
customer_reviews.text: Good product but doesn't fit my cabinets( cabinet is wider than the rack and it won't stay in place) I have to return it 😢
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: Mug organizer
customer_reviews.text: The item takes up more room in the cabinet than expected but I love it! Mugs are no longer taking up room on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Brush

customer_reviews.title: Dimension I guess
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't fit on the cabinet. Couldn't close cabinet door. Not enough hooks even if it fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use product
customer_reviews.text: Good product just did not fit our shelves. My husband will repurpose for tools, multi-use product.
customer_reviews.author: A User

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for the back staff room of our business to store employee coffee mugs and it is very good- easy to place and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Baywood Inn

product_meta.title: bafvt Coffee Mug Holder - 304 Stainless Steel Cup Rack Under Cabinet, 10Hooks, Fit for The Cabinet 0.8" or Less
product_meta.description:
Size:10

Specification:

 

Type: 10 hooks cups storage under shelf

 

Material: 304(18/8)stainless steel

 

Size: 10.8" * 6.5" * 2.8"

 

APPLICABLE CABINET THICKNESS: 0.8" OR LESS

 

NEATLY HOLDS UP TO 10 SMALL COFFEE MUGS OR 6 LARGE CUPS

 



 

Feature：

 

1. 304(18/8)stainless steel. High quality metal material, firm and anti-rust. 

 

2. Multi-functional shelf. Can serve as mugs holder, drying rack, kitchen utensils shelf, ornament shelf, ties and other small items shelf.

 

3. Easy to install. More suitable for kitchen hanging cabinets, wardrobe partitions, office filecabinets and so on.

 



 

Notice：

 

1. Max bearing weight is 22 pounds. Due to the limited load-bearing capacity of the storage rack, too heavy items may cause the tail of the shelf to sag or the hook to straighten.

 

2. No screws. If you want to fix it better, you need to have your own screws. When installing, be sure to leave enough space for hanging cups.

 

3. More suitable for cabinets without doors. Otherwise, there needs a gap between the front edge of the shelf and the lower edge of the cabinet door.

 

4. Precautions for installation. Require a shelf depth of at least 12 inches, so that the 2 hooks at the end are available.
feature_bullets: 10 HOOKS COFFEE MUGS HOLDER - 2 inches spacing per two hooks, neatly holds up to 10 SMALL COFFEE MUGS OR 6 LARGE CUPS depending on the size of the cups.
304 STAINLESS STEEL - High quality metal, anti-rust and not easy to bend, max bearing weight is 22 pounds.

APPROXIMATE DIMENSIONS - The upper length is 8 inches, the bottom length is 10.8 inches, the width is 6.5 inches and the hooks length is 2 inches, requires a shelf depth of at least 12 inches, FIT FOR THE CABINET 0.8 INCHES THICK OR LESS.
EASY TO INSTALL - Slide the hanging arm onto the shelf or the underside of cabinet, no damage to furniture.
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL STORAGE RACK - Not only can be used as cups holder, but also be used as kitchen utensils holder, drying rack, jewelries rack, etc.
